incidents.description: While travelling along the road I encountered a small band of thieves.
incidents.goodResult: They fled at the sight of me, leaving some small treasures.
incidents.badResult: They attacked with unexpected ferocity, and I barely escaped.
incidents.neutralResult: I was able to skirt their camp and move on without incident.

incidents.description: Bandits sprung upon me while I rested.
incidents.goodResult: Their overconfidence was their weakness and I was able to best their leader. The rest fled, leaving behind some small treasures.
incidents.badResult: Overcome by their numbers, I defeated only a few before fleeing into the woods.
incidents.neutralResult: With some clever wordplay I managed to convince them that I was a travelling wizard. They had no interest in meddling after that, and moved along without incident.

incidents.description: While travelling on the road I met a group of bards. The jovial troupe played beautiful music into the night.
incidents.goodResult: When I awoke I found they had prepared a delicious meal and recited heroic poems until we parted ways.
incidents.badResult: I awoke with a terrible headache, the camp abandoned and my goods plundered.
incidents.neutralResult: We shared songs and poetry and laughed together, parting ways amicably and without incident.

incidents.description: On the road I spotted a lucious bush of Calenberries and I helped myself.
incidents.goodResult: I was delighted and invigorated by the familiar Calenberry juice that every child loves. I even managed to trade a handful to a nearby peddler.
incidents.badResult: I quickly realized that they were not Calenberries at all. Luckily a healer had a shingle nearby and I was "purged" of the volatile victuals.
incidents.neutralResult: I enjoyed the sweet berries and the short respite, then carried on.

incidents.description: As I travelled along the road fierce storm clouds rolled in.
incidents.goodResult: The shade of the clouds reinvigorated me and I was able to deftly barter off some herbs and pelts that I had collected on my journey.
incidents.badResult: Tumultuous rain quickly began to fall and I made for the nearest inn. While waiting a ruffian picked a fight with me. I won, but had to pay some damages.
incidents.neutralResult: The rainfall turned out to be light and cool, and I carried on refreshed.
